Configuration.SetupScript: #sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 23589') #sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 6.01') config.wavelength = 6 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -47 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.9863 config.beamcenterz = 94.3419 config.drive()
